Literature.Title: The effect of thiol functional group incorporation into cationic helical peptides on antimicrobial activities and spectra.
Literature.Author: Wiradharma N, Khan M, Yong LK, Hauser CA, Seow SV, Zhang S, Yang YY

Literature.Title: Cationic amphiphilic alpha-helical peptides for the treatment of carbapenem-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii infection.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=63µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=250µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=20-50µg/ml)
